pr_title: CAMEL-14576: camel-hbase - Test using test containers

timeline.message: CAMEL-14576: camel-hbase - Test using test containers

timeline.bodyText: This is really an old version of guava. Anyway, please use a property placeholder from parent
timeline.author: oscerd
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -208,36 +75,18 @@
                     <groupId>log4j</groupId>
                     <artifactId>log4j</artifactId>
                 </exclusion>
-                <exclusion>
-                    <groupId>junit</groupId>
-                    <artifactId>junit</artifactId>
-                </exclusion>
             </exclusions>
         </dependency>
-        <!-- because hbase-server 1.1.1 use hadoop2.5.1 by default, check is it still required by the next version update -->
         <dependency>
-            <groupId>org.apache.hadoop</groupId>
-            <artifactId>hadoop-client</artifactId>
-            <version>${hadoop2-version}</version>
-            <classifier>tests</classifier>
+            <groupId>com.google.guava</groupId>
+            <artifactId>guava</artifactId>
+            <version>12.0.1</version>

replies.bodyText: I used this version, cause it's used in hbase-test util, and it is not working with the version automatically taken (i suppose it its overriden by  some other dep)
replies.author: manonthegithub

replies.bodyText: Yeah unfortunately we need to use old version for testing this old hbase version. IMHO as its a test scoped dependency then its okay to stay here as version number, and we should look at upgrading to newer hbase also.
replies.author: davsclaus

timeline.bodyText: Use the zookeeper version property placeholder from parent, or create a new placeholder in parent
